EmailTemplate.name: RE: Master SubContractor Agreement - Eddie Fernandez (1319826779.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Master SubContractor Agreement - Eddie Fernandez (1319826779.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Eddy,
I just sent the contract over to Denise with proposed changes and copied you on the email. If you have questions about any of our changes please let me know. I will keep you copied on correspondence between MBO and Daugherty so you will know the status as we go along.
Regarding our GSA, I spoke with my manager and he let me know that the we will be unable to use the previous GSA you signed. If you have proposed changes to the current document you may send those to me and I would be happy to discuss them with you. I will not have any time to speak today but I am available Monday morning around 10:00am or between 11:30-1. Please let me know if you are available and I am happy to reach out to you.
I look forward to speaking with you!
Have a great weekend,
Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Eduardo Fernandez [mailto:eddy_fern@yahoo.com] Sent: Friday, October 28, 2011 2:04 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: Master SubContractor Agreement - Eddie Fernandez
Hi Nicolette,
I wanted to check with you to see if the agreement with Daugherty is now signed and in place. Also, I wanted to ask if you would call me to discuss the GSA between myself and MBO. I have questions about the GSA and would prefer to use the last agreement that was modified and put in place between myself and MBO. Feel free to reach to call me on my cell.
Eddy Fernandez 770-605-5013
From: Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> To: "Pacelli, Denise" <Denise.Pacelli@daugherty.com> Cc: Eduardo Fernandez <eddy_fern@yahoo.com> Sent: Thursday, October 27, 2011 3:11 PM Subject: RE: Master SubContractor Agreement - Eddie Fernandez Thank you Denise! I will review this with our contracts team and follow up with you sometime tomorrow.
If I have any questions I will let you know.
Have a great afternoon,
Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com

From: Pacelli, Denise [mailto:Denise.Pacelli@daugherty.com] Sent: Thursday, October 27, 2011 1:38 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Master SubContractor Agreement - Eddie Fernandez
Hi Nicolette,
Attached is a our master agreement that will need to be reviewed and executed. Once we have received this signed we will issue a PO for Eddie Fernandez to work at Norfolk Southern. We do not have a confirmed start date as of yet but it should be next week.
If you have any questions please feel free to call me.
Thank you,
Denise Pacelli Office Manager / Atlanta Branch
Daugherty Business Solutions 3438 Peachtree Road, Ste 950 Atlanta, GA 30326 Phone: 404-760-5400 Fax: 404-760-5402
